name: Astatin
overview: Welcome to Astatin, the game of the nobility of Radon, it was brought to Earth for you by Alive Designs. A New Challenge If you thought it wasn't possible to continue wrecking your nerves, then you should pick up this game. For 100 levels you can solve the tasks given to you with drops of sweat on your forehead. You might be one of the lucky ones to survive this game unscathed. Astatin is a Puzzle game, developed by Alive Designs and published by Talesoft, which was released in Europe in 1992. The game is to make the pictures on the area on the left match the ones given on the right. However, the pictures will change corresponding to changes\pictures around them, so the one you choose may influence the ones around them. Find the pattern and pass the level.
